finding.title: AgentGuard: Repurposing Agentic Orchestrator for Safety Evaluation of Tool Orchestration
finding.description: The integration of tool use into large language models (LLMs) enables agentic systems with real-world impact. In the meantime, unlike standalone LLMs, compromised agents can execute malicious workflows with more consequential impact, signified by their tool-use capability. We propose AgentGuard, a framework to autonomously discover and validate unsafe tool-use workflows, followed by generating safety constraints to confine the behaviors of agents, achieving the baseline of safety guarantee at de
finding.implementationSuggestion: Review orchestration patterns for potential NEURAFORGE enhancements
